EmailTemplate.subject: New - California Registered Service Agency Online System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to the new Registered Service Agency (RSA) Online Portal!
As a Registered Service Agent you will have access to the Portal to print and view your Service Agent License.
Please login to the RSA Portal to view your account, including your updated license information. Once logged in, click Agent Profile, then select Print License to print a copy of your Service Agent License.
For future reference, your username is {!Receiving_User.Username}.
This license is valid through {!Contact.License_To_Date__c}.
For RSA Program information, please visit CDFA - DMS - Registered Service Agency (ca.gov).
RSA Administrator Division of Measurement Standards California Department of Food and Agriculture
Questions? Please contact us at rsa@cdfa.ca.gov.
